snippet: Meilech Schnitzler, 36, is accused of tossing a cup of the substance into the face of an outspoken advocate for victims of sexual abuse in the ultra-Orthodox Jewish community.
abstract: Police charge Brooklyn fishmonger Meilech Schnitzler with assault for throwing bleach in Rabbi Nuchem Rosenberg's face; Rosenberg is outspoken advocate for victims of sexual abuse in the borough's ultra-Orthodox Satmar Hasidic community and had referred to Schnitzler's father on his blog of being a molester.
lead_paragraph: Meilech Schnitzler, 36, is accused of tossing a cup of the substance into the face of an outspoken advocate for victims of sexual abuse in the ultra-Orthodox Jewish community.

headline.seo: Brooklyn Man Charged in Bleach Attack on Rabbi
headline.main: Fishmonger Charged in Bleach Attack on a Rabbi
headline.print_headline: Fishmonger Held in Attack Against Rabbi
